subject: For the Tec's in the Group
author: Jules
full_text:
I was just recently given this book by one of my fellow colleagues.

http://books.google.com/books?
id=eedLEdxSN8sC&dq=electronic+projects+from+the+next+dimension&pg=PP1&ot
s=acogIrG_4R&sig=1OnTjG-fH2W33He4Bw20t-
K2SsM&hl=en&prev=http://www.google.com/search?sourceid=navclient&ie=UTF-
8&rlz=1T4GFRC_enUS214US214&q=electronic+projects+from+the+next+dimension
&sa=X&oi=print&ct=title&cad=one-book-with-thumbnail

It is a book on Electronic Projects from the Next Dimension by Newton 
C. Braga.  It has some amazing electronic experiments in it, from 
Instrumental transcommunication, to spirit images.  

I thought that some many want to try out some of these projects.

Enjoy!
Juli
